title: cant change account password
body: trying to log into my smurf and cant remember the pass. When i type my name into the box it says there was an error.

replies.body: I'd like to help and try to get this figured out!  What does the error say?  Make sure you're logging in through the correct region as your first step.  Also make sure that you're using the username for that account and not the summoner name.  You may also use the [account recovery](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751694-Recovering-Your-Account) guide to help recover access to your account.  Hope that helps!
